description: This table contains Home Health care plan problems overtime single items information. This information is entered in the Care Plan task on the Home Health Remote Client.

columns.name: PROBLEM_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the care plan problem record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Unique identifier for this contact for this patient.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUMBER
columns.description: The serial number of the contact on the care plan problem record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the contact. Links to table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: LAST_EDIT_INST
columns.description: Instant at which care plan problem was last edited.

columns.name: IS_RESOLVED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the care plan problem is resolved. 'Y' indicates that the care plan problem is resolved. 'N' or NULL indicate that the care plan problem is not resolved. Links to category list ZC_LPB_IS_RESOLVED.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


YES


NO

columns.name: PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Care plan problem priority.  Links to category list ZC_CP_PRIORITY.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CARE_PLAN_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the care plan problem contact that is associated with the care plan.
